markdownRemark.html: The Club is located in Baza, has about 250 members and its tennis school trains about 90 students. It was built in 1975 by its founding partners and today is one of the oldest clubs in the city of Granada. The club facilities includes 7 tennis courts, 1 padel tennis court, a multi-sports court, mini turf soccer field, pool, bar, restaurant lounge, as well as a very nice atmosphere.

frontmatter.title: Club de Tenis Cid-Hiaya

frontmatter.address: Carr. de Murcia, Km. 176, 18800 Baza, Granada
tags: Top Things to do with kids in Granada
